```{r 73-remove-all, include = FALSE}
rm(list = ls())
```


## Flattening

<details><summary>*Click here to make setup code visible*</summary>
```{r include = FALSE}
### Flattening

```
```{r 73-setup-73-flatten-r}
library(tidyverse)
library(here)

komoot <- readRDS(here("data/komoot.rds"))

komoot_content <-
  komoot %>%
  pull(content)

coordinates <-
  komoot_content %>%
  map(list("features", 1, "geometry", "coordinates"))
```
</details>


```{r include = FALSE}
# Odd structure:
```
```{r 73-odd-structure}
coordinates %>%
  pluck(1)
```


```{r include = FALSE}
# Flattening can chop off a layer, need to specify output type:
```
```{r 73-flattening-can-chop-off-a-layer-need-to-specify-output-type}
coordinates %>%
  pluck(1) %>%
  flatten_dbl()
```


```{r include = FALSE}
# Apply to entire list:
```
```{r 73-apply-to-entire-list}
coordinates %>%
  map(~ flatten_dbl(.))
```
